attributes.action: outlaw the practice, by scottish constituency MPs holding office in our Government, of issuing directives which exempts their wives or partners from security scrutiny when entering government buildings.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Speaker of the HofC has exempted his wife and those accompanying her at the time from being inconvenienced by the security check staff at the entrance to the Palace of Westminster.  Smuggling in explosives in large parties who are not being security checked is a well used method of achieving access and scoring a 'spectacular' by terrorists and this abuse of Mr Speakers authority is putting our seat of democracy at risk and should be reversed.  If Mrs Speaker doesn't want to be inconvenienced then she should avoid going to the place.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
